sentences.sContent: The term "Arabian Gulf" has been in casual but inconsistent use by various members of the US navy and government, and by many Arab states, for a few decades now.
sentences.sContent_eng: The term "Arabian Gulf" has been in casual but inconsistent use by various members of the US navy and government, and by many Arab states, for a few decades now.
sentences.sCn: 这一术语“阿拉伯湾”只是一个非正式的词汇，但它已经被美国海军各机构和美国政府，以及许多阿拉伯国家南腔北调的用了几十年。

phrases.pCn: 一千零一夜（书名，又名天方夜谭）；不真实的故事
adj. 沙特阿拉伯的；沙特阿拉伯人的

trans.tranCn: 阿拉伯人 a阿拉伯(人)的
